item.title: MVP site interview
item.author: Author
item.description: My 5 minutes of glory üòÇ Yesterday the guys of MS published my brief interview MVP site. However, it is not the full version, that I copy here. About Llu√≠s Franco Born in Barcelona (Spain) with more than 20 years of experience in the software development sector, now lives in Andorra for the past 15 years with his family. Lluis holds a number of Microsoft official certifications such as MCP and MCTS and has been recognized as MVP for the past 10 years due to his active participation and moderation in the MSDN forums since 1997.
